text: Klimeschia afghanica is a moth in the family Douglasiidae. It was described by Reinhard Gaedike in 1974. It is found in Afghanistan, Iran and Tuva, Russia.New and poorly known Palaearctic Microlepidoptera (Tineidae, Acrolepiidae, Douglasiidae, Epermeniidae) ==References== Category:Moths described in 1974 Category:Douglasiidae
title: Klimeschia afghanica
